issue.title: [CF 84] Casting Filter
issue.body:
Hi,

I made a filter list for the Casting option.
You can use it if you want to integrate Heals, CC and other PvP relevant spells and "should be kicked" Boss abilities.

greeting

--Heals

--Druid

50464    --Nourish (weak)

5185    --Healing Touch
8936     --Regrowth
740    --Tranquility

--Priest

2050    -- Heal (weak)

2060    --Greater Heal
2061    --Flash Heal
32546    --Binding Heal
596    --Prayer of Healing
64843    --Divine Hymn

--Paladin

635    --Holy Light (weak)

82326    --Divine Light
19750    --Flash of Light

--Shaman

331    --Healing Wave (weak)

77472    --Greater Healing Wave
8004    --Heaing Surge
1064    --Chain Heal
73920    --Healing Rain

--CC (or other "should be kicked" stuff) (PVP)

--Druid

33786    --Cyclone
339    --Entangling Roots
20484    --Rebirth (BR)

--Hunter

1513    --Scare Beast
982    --Revive Pet

--Priest

64901    --Hymn of Hope
605    --Mind Control
453    --Mana Burn

--Warlock

5782    --Fear
5484    --Howl of Terror
79268    --Soul Harvest

--Paladin

10326    --Turn Evil

--Shaman

51514    --Hex

--Mage

118    --Polymorph
12051    --Evocation

--PvE

--The Bastion of Twilight

--Halfus Wyrmbreaker

43088    --Shadow Nova
86168    --Shadow Nova

--Ascendant Council

82752    --Hydro Lance
92510    --Hydro Lance
92511    --Hydro Lance

82636    --Rising Flames

83070    --Lightning Blast
92455    --Lightning Blast
92456    --Lightning Blast

--Blackwing Descent

--Omnitron Defense System

79710    --Arcane Annihilator
91541    --Arcane Annihilator
91542    --Arcane Annihilator

--Maloriak

77908    --Arcane Storm
92961    --Arcane Storm
92962    --Arcane Storm
92963    --Arcane Storm

77569    --Release Aberrations
92703    --Release Aberrations
92704    --Release Aberrations

--Nefarian

80734    --Blast Nova


> Posted by CurseForge user Skudnfroodie | Imported from CurseForge issue #84 | Raw

comments.body:
Woah. I like you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just a note, you only have to include the spellIDs once for each spell, because I can only check against the name of the spell being cast with the current API (UnitCastingInfo does not provide the ID of the spell being cast.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
